name: LogicBomb Media
tag_list: web-design-atlanta, atlanta-web-design, atlanta-web-development, web-development-atlanta, mobile-app-development, mobile-application-development
overview:
Quality web and mobile development company focused on providing custom web-based applications to improve business operations.

We consider our web design and web development solutions to be our “bread and butter.” We began the company developing custom Flash Applications for company’s locally (Atlanta) and world-wide. Though Flash has become less popular, we have found that our most sought after service is our custom PHP applications and JQuery/JavaScript programming.

Over the years we have been involved in corporate and start-up development projects for mobile applications. Our development team has vast knowledge in developing apps for the most popular mobile platforms, specifically iOS and Android. As mobile technology and use becomes increasingly popular, the mobile development team is constantly creating ground-breaking mobile apps.
